title: Defense of peace

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/United Nations. General Assembly
description: Describes the organisation and mode of work of the UN. Animated charts and maps, together with live action scenes, show how the UN machinery provides a realistic method of dealing with international problems. Introduces the General Assembly Security Council, International Court of Justice, Economic and Social council and the Trusteeship Council.
